column3: â€œAmazing strain I currently cultivate, found some inaccuracies with leafly's overview so I wanted to clear it up from a growers perspective, afternoon delight is from Crockett family farms and the cross on this strain is Banana kush x Schrom x Tangie, it's a slightly sativa dominant strain with a very smooth smoke and a tropical citrus flavor with a hint of banana, if you come across this strain I highly recommend it.â€

â€œA strain for the connoisseur. This strain stands out amongst the 250 strains that I have enjoyed over the years. Potent, intoxicating, narcotic. Truly, it engulfed my mind in a lucid, hypnotic trance that brought me to the edge of enlightenment and expanded my consciousness. I have been medicating for a long time. Loved this strain and the uplifting, though unfocused, euphoria it imbibed on my conscience-body. As far...â€
â€œAnd the thought of loving you is getting so exciting
column5: afternoon delight" you'll be singing sweet songs when you imbibe on this delightful strain. One of the few strains with a dominant apple flavor
column6: this fruit forward dense flower is an indica dominant so be wary not to smoke too much in the afternoon unless you're looking for some serious couch time. Pine notes also dance on the nose with the...â€"

column3:
â€œSmell- EXTREMELY potent. Definitely can't hide this one. 

Look- Very beautiful, dense, light green, large nugs. The second you grind it the aroma fills the room. Love it. It grinds extremely well. Not too fluffy and not too dense to where the grind is too fine. Perfect for rolling blunts with good airflow.

Smoke- smooth but kicks ya, you should feel this right off the bat. 

Feel- This gives you an uplifted feel, l...â€
â€œTingly, euphoric trance; almost other-worldly. I tried this strain because of Arrested Development, and I am not disappointed.â€
â€œThe high lasts 4EVER! It really is a delightful for an entire afternoon. Try it if you get the chance.â€

â€œLike being rocked to relaxation by Mother earth. It's sweet & relaxing when you exhale, like a literal breathe of fresh air. It also packs a heavy high, but not so much that you're couch locked or get the sweats.â€
â€œExcellent strain, just make some room on your favorites list. Very potent, early onset coupled with latent effects. Taste good and smokes wellâ€

â€œThird best I've ever had. (First is tangerine dream, second is moui woui and third is this.) really strong, very floral and herbal smell (like dried rosemary) and the cerebral high is killer. You need a little more to get super fucked but it's really good.â€
â€œExcellent strain, just make some room on your favorites list. Very potent, early onset coupled with latent effects. Taste good and smokes wellâ€

â€œI really enjoyed this strain of weed, one of my personal favorites. I got a nice relaxing high and got hella munchies with it. This strain is perfect for a relaxing day outside. If you come across Afternoon Delight I highly recommend it.â€
â€œTingly afâ€

â€œI had the concentrate, crumble specificly. At 85% thc its not for a novice. A great vanilla spicy flavor and immediate heady high. Alsmost like another dimension. Lol visual stimulation for sure. Get strain for a stressful day as all thoughts become nonsensical lol its definitely top shelf strong sativa leaning /indica hybrid.â€

â€œI get this strain for $14.99 an eighth at my dispensary without complaining about a few seeds. 
What I get is a superb price but a very mellow and sluggish kind of high. I'm not one to complain about weed that works but this gets me tired. With 0% cbd and the name of the strain I expected different.â€
â€œnice feeling high but those flavors did not work for me at all.â€
â€œGreat for afternoon unwindâ€
â€œIt is an excellent hybrid that brings a great and soothing head high while also relaxing any racing thoughts as well as your body. It's good for afternoon, morning, and evening, in my opinion.â€
â€œabsolutely the only name for this strain taste was unbelievable  grab a sunny d and relaxâ€
â€œ'Twas a fun timeâ€
â€œIt's a really good strain tbh it's says you feel tingly but I didn't but damn dude this shits one of the top 10 I've smokedâ€
